preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 20.0 g of Potassium Sulfide. 
 2. Measure out 10.0 g of Antimony. 
 3. Measure out 30.0 g of Silicon Dioxide. 
 4. Measure out 40.0 g of Sulfur. 
 5. Combine all measured ingredients in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 6. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture into a fine powder for uniformity.
